categories: Category:Jedi Knights of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Blendri was a female Jedi Knight serving the Jedi Order on Ossus during the Order's early years. Joining several other Jedi, Blendri became a Jedi Renunciate and a Legionnaire of Lettow, one of the many followers of Xendor during the First Great Schism.

A Force-sensitive, Blendri lived on Ossus, the home of the Jedi Order during its early years. Friends with fellow Padawan Danzigorro Potts, Blendri japed with him when she ascended to the rank of Jedi Knight while he remained an apprentice. Taking on a Padawan of her own named Cuthallox, Blendri and her student became enamored by the enigmatic teachings of Xendor, who preached that the Jedi High Council was too restrictive in their teachings and wished to limit understanding of the Force. When Xendor parted with the Order to found an academy on Lettow, Blendri and Cuthallox departed with Jedi Master Jook-jook H'broozin to learn from Xendor. Calling themselves the Legions of Lettow, the Jedi Renunciates grew strong in the Force as they studied the Bogan through many different Force-traditions.

When the High Council declared war on the Legions of Lettow, Blendri and Cuthallox took up swords to protect their rights to study the Force. Meeting the Order in a full-blown conflict called the Great Schism by the Order, the Master-Padawan pair jumped from world to world to fight off the Jedi. At the battle of Corulag Jedi Padawan Danzigorro Potts killed Master H'broozin and attempted to kill Blendri and Cuthallox but the pair managed to escape. Padawan Potts would continue to hunt the pair throughout the war until he finally met them on the field of battle at Columus. Engaging her old friend, Blendri was outmatched and killed on the field of battle.
